page.title: 04THE COTSWOLD WAY WEST BATH
page.content: We went in our teacher's car to the {Cotswold Way}where we went on a public footpath.The Cotswold way is a long {walkway,}the path is rough in some areas.It is steep in some places and there is lots of rough ground,but in other areas the ground is quite flat.If it's a nice clear day you can see for miles on the top of the hills.Altogether it is a nice walk and there are a lot of{wild flowers and {trees.}There is a{view point}on the {Cotswold Way}which allows you to see a long way.After we had looked at the view for quite a while we walked along a bit and jumped over a stile and came to a farm called{Pendean Farm.
